## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.

```{r}
#Nitrate comparisons over long term decadal
Grp<-split(AllCW, f=AllCW$Group)


ttP<-t.test(Ponds3$NO3 ~ Ponds3$Decade)
ttU<-t.test(TF3$NO3 ~ TF3$Decade)
ttL<-t.test(OH3$NO3 ~ OH3$Decade)
ttC<-t.test(MH3$NO3 ~ MH3$Decade)
library(broom)
library(purrr)
library(knitr)
tab <- map_df(list(ttP,ttU,ttL,ttC), tidy)
kable(tab, caption="Nitrate Decade Comparison")
```

```{r}
#Nitrate comparisons present to last year
Ponds4 <-rbind(Ponds18,Ponds19)
TF4 <-rbind(TF18,TF19)
OH4 <-rbind(OH18,OH19)
MH4 <-rbind(MH18,MH19)
Ponds4$Year <- as.numeric(format(Ponds4$DATE,format="%Y"))
TF4$Year <- as.numeric(format(TF4$DATE,format="%Y"))
OH4$Year <- as.numeric(format(OH4$DATE,format="%Y"))
MH4$Year <- as.numeric(format(MH4$DATE,format="%Y"))

ttP<-t.test(Ponds4$NO3 ~ Ponds4$Year)
ttU<-t.test(TF4$NO3 ~ TF4$Year)
ttL<-t.test(OH4$NO3 ~ OH4$Year)
ttC<-t.test(MH4$NO3 ~ MH4$Year)

library(broom)
library(purrr)
library(knitr)
tab <- map_df(list(ttP,ttU,ttL,ttC), tidy)
kable(tab, caption="Nitrate Comparison to Last Year")
```

```{r}
#Bact comparisons over long term decadal
LTAbst<-rbind(BST2012,BST2013,BST2014,BST2015,BST2016,BST2017)
colnames(LTAbst)<-c("Date","Site","Bacteria","Month")
LTAbact<-rbind(LTAbst,BST2018)
LTAbact$Year<-as.numeric(format(LTAbact$Date,format="%Y"))
LTAbact$Decade <- floor_decade(LTAbact$Year)
BST2019$Year<-as.numeric(format(BST2019$Date,format="%Y"))
BST2019$Decade<-("2019")
AllBact<-rbind(LTAbact,BST2019)
Loc<-split(AllBact, f=AllBact$Site)
PondsBST<-rbind(Loc$`2`,Loc$`3`,Loc$`6`)
TFBST<-rbind(Loc$`11`,Loc$`27`)
OHBST<-rbind(Loc$`21`,Loc$`17`)
MHBST<-rbind(Loc$`28`)


ttP<-t.test(as.numeric(PondsBST$Bacteria) ~ PondsBST$Decade)
ttU<-t.test(as.numeric(TFBST$Bacteria) ~ TFBST$Decade)
ttL<-t.test(as.numeric(OHBST$Bacteria) ~ OHBST$Decade)
ttC<-t.test(as.numeric(MHBST$Bacteria) ~ MHBST$Decade)
library(broom)
library(purrr)
library(knitr)
BSTtab <- map_df(list(ttP,ttU,ttL,ttC), tidy)
kable(BSTtab, caption="BST Decade Comparison")
```
